name: 2019 International Conference on Management Science and Industrial Engineering MSIE
content: Conference official website：http://www.msie.org/ Meeting time：May 24-26, 2019\. Meeting place：Phuket, Thailand/CAPE PANWA HOTEL, PHUKET. Host unit：ACM Singapore Chapter. keynote speaker： Prof. Maged Dessouky, University of Southern California,USA Prof. XU Yang, Beijing University, China Prof. Chen-Fu Chien, National Tsing Hua University, Taiwan Fugee Tsung, The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology, Hong Kong Parames Chutima, Chulalongkorn University，Thailand Published by： MSIE 2019 is supported by ACM Singapore Chapter. Accepted papers will be published into ACM conference proceedings(ISBN: 978-1-4503-6264-1), which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec etc. Call for Papers： Decision Analysis and Methods. Information Processing and Engineering. Intelligent Systems. Manufacturing Systems. E-Business and E-Commerce. Healthcare Systems and Management. Human Factors. Quality Control and Management. Reliability and Maintenance Engineering. Important Dates Deadline (full text) : March 20, 2019\. Conference Contact :Ms. Amanda Wong mailbox: msie@acm-sg.org Tel: +86-021-59561560
